net.wombatrpgs.mgne.global
Class Global

java.lang.Object
  net.wombatrpgs.mgne.global.Global
Direct Known Subclasses:
RGlobal
public class Global
extends java.lang.Object

GLOBAL - THE GLOBAL CLASS. It's a big giant class that's just "there" and holds references to all those other lesser global classes. Singleton pattern is annoying so there are no singleton guards, but this class would handle them if there were any. Actually there really should be guards shouldn't they?
